byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: Westchester County district attorney's office will re-examine 2008 death of 2-week-old baby belonging to Yonkers woman Jennifer Berry; death was originally attributed to natural causes; move is prompted by new incident in which Berry is charged with second degree murder for allegedly throwing her newborn out window of Bronx apartment building.
lead_paragraph: After Jennifer Berry was accused of throwing her newborn girl out a window this week, Westchester County officials said they would review the 2008 case, in which her baby boy was ruled to have died from natural causes.

headline.main: Murder Case Against Mother Spurs Review of ’08 Death of Another Child
headline.print_headline: Murder Case Against Mother Spurs Review of ’08 Death of Another Child

snippet: After Jennifer Berry was accused of throwing her newborn girl out a window this week, Westchester County officials said they would review the 2008 case, in which her baby boy was ruled to have died from natural causes.
